Official: Event - Festival of the Fallen - Dates and Preview

22
Alastir
Thursday, August 24th, 2017, 11:19:58 PM

@Mazreth posted Festival of the Fallen – Dates and Preview

Hello again everyone. The dates for Festival of the Fallen are confirmed and it will run from September 7th through September 10th. Grounds will open at 4pm Eastern on the 7th and close at midnight eastern on the 10th. For those of you who missed it last time, this is a martial themed event with gladiator pits and a tournament. GM Zoelle, GM Kynlee, and I have worked very hard to try to bring you a wide variety of services, shops, and fun. I look forward to seeing everyone there!

Arena - We will be having the arena contest again this year and more information about entering will be coming shortly. Some changes have been made to the combat based on feedback from previous runs. More details to come! The tournament will be held on Friday the 8th in Plat and the 9th in Prime.

Shops – Yep, we'll have lots! Some you've seen before with all new exciting merchandise and others you haven't!

Games – You bet we have the dagger toss and hatchet throw again, with several nice things in the unique hopper!.

Services – Raffles and auctions abound!

A royal ball – (I'm looking at you Nihrvanah). What would a bloody gore-filled festival be if without scrubbing down and dressing up when it's all over? Ball will be held from 9 pm eastern to 11 pm eastern on Sunday in Prime. (Time for Plat's is still pending)

Teasers – RSN!

~Mazreth

We have a lot of great stuff going out so here's my TENTATIVE schedule for raffles:

Prime: Thursday - September 7th - 7pm ET - Raffle for 10 winners - Spike adding to armor - (this is set up) Thursday - September 7th - 8:30pm ET - Raffle for 5 winners - Adding morphing to fusion - (this is set up) Thursday - September 7th - 10pm ET - Raffle for 3 winners - Sonic alterations - (this is set up) Friday - September 8th - 7pm ET - Raffle for 1 winner - Climatewear hood adding with feature concealer Friday - September 8th - 10:30pm ET - Raffle for 2 winners - Sonic alterations Saturday - September 9th - 12pm ET - Citizen Only Raffle 1 Winner - Greater Moods adding and customization. (This is a delayed service, and you MUST have the item on your person at the time of the drawing to confirm eligibility, and you must be present.) Saturday - September 9th - 12:30pm ET - Raffle for 1 winner - Greater Moods adding and customization (This is a delayed service, and you MUST have the item on your person at the time of the drawing to confirm eligibility, and you must be present.) Saturday - September 9th - 3pm ET - Raffle for 1 winner - Permablessing on an 8x weapon or less (no weighting or combat scripts) Saturday - September 9th - 4pm ET - Raffle for 15 winners - Spike adding to armor

Platinum: Thursday - September 7th - 7:45pm ET - Raffle for 5 winners - Adding morphing to fusion - (this is set up) Friday - September 8th - 2pm ET - Raffle for 2 winners - Sonic Alterations Friday - September 8th - 5pm ET - Raffle for 1 winner - Climatewear hood adding with feature concealer Saturday - September 9th - 1:30pm ET - Citizen Only Raffle 1 Winner - Greater Moods adding and customization. (This is a delayed service, and you MUST have the item on your person at the time of the drawing to confirm eligibility.) Saturday - September 9th - 2:00pm ET - Raffle for 1 winner - Greater Moods adding and customization (This is a delayed service, and you MUST have the item on your person at the time of the drawing to confirm eligibility.) Saturday - September 9th - 3:30pm ET - Raffle for 1 winner - Permablessing on an 8x weapon or less (no weighting or combat scripts)

As a reminds, these raffles will all be set up on the system that requires you to be in game to win. Please read the ticket before you enter the raffle.

~Zoelle~

Evarin
Thursday, September 7th, 2017, 8:13:44 PM

Quote from GM Zoelle: http://forums.play.net/forums/GemStone%20IV/World%20Events,%20Festivals,%20and%20Storylines/Festival%20of%20the%20Fallen/view/416

What are the Creature Bane restrictions, can these raffle wins be added to weapons with weighting and/or combat scripts?

No weighting, nothing higher than 7x enchants, no claidmores or katanas, no combat scripts. Please be willing to work with us as other restrictions MAY apply, but we'll be checking it on a case by case basis.

~Zoelle~

Good morning, could someone provide clarification on why there are two sets of brigandine in Rikelle’s Protect and Serve morphing armor shop that have different costs? They both analyze as off the shelf unlock, but one costs 280k and the other 325k. There is a different description on one, but I wasn’t sure if that was the reason for the higher cost.

One set is imflass which comes at a naturally reduced weight (it naturally weighs less than vultite) and costs a bit more.

~Zoelle~

Evarin
Friday, September 8th, 2017, 7:04:55 PM

Quote from GM Zoelle: http://forums.play.net/forums/GemStone%20IV/World%20Events,%20Festivals,%20and%20Storylines/Festival%20of%20the%20Fallen/view/476 (477)

Can you clarify if the climatewear needs to be at a certain tier to recieve this service? I assume that it needs to be fully unlocked already, but I wanted to be sure. Thanks!

It does not. I will be unlocking the cloak to the appropriate level and I will be adding the hood. However, the cloak DOES need to have the climatewear script already attached to it as I will not be adding it.

~Zoelle~

High end hopper teasers?

There are a few certificates in the hopper that allow Rikelle to add her morphing armor ability to existing fusion armor.

~Zoelle~

The raffle is for "For one of 5 spots for adding acuity or mana to a runestaff of your choice. The staff can be any enchant. The addition of acuity or mana cannot bring the flare above 6x/+3. You should be present within 5 minutes of the drawing or another will be chosen. Each item can only be worked on once. The item should be in your hand. Items should not be passed around."

This is inside Points and Polish and draws tomorrow night.

~ Valyrka ~ Ta'Illistim Elves Dark Elves
